definition: courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: This small brothers why to nowadays angel up adore thus?
sentences.chinese: 这位小兄弟何以对当今圣上如此推崇？

sentences.english: And for the table holy mercy, will inform YanShiFan Yang Xiu lenient.
sentences.chinese: 而为表圣上仁慈，通知严世藩将杨秀从轻发落。

definition: state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
the emperor/Your majesty the emperor/His imperial majesty
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
enlightened sage/brilliant master (flattering words applied to ruler)
